results.name: a(n) is Chowla function of n read modulo (number of proper divisors of n), a(1) = 0 by convention.
comment: Chowla's function (A048050) = sum of divisors of n except 1 and n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 17 2000
